pages.title: Azurite
pages.text: A rich blue ore, which, at a distance, can almost be mistaken for lapis. In its natural form it contains many impurities, which must first be removed, before it can be used. It is found deep underground.

pages.title: Refining
pages.text: Refining Azurite is not a cheap task. This pure ingot form can be used for a lot more recipes, though.
